main_definition: Medicines refer to substances used for treating, preventing or diagnosing diseases or alleviating symptoms. This term can also include herbal remedies and over-the-counter drugs.

meanings_and_examples.example: Antibiotics are a type of medicine that doctors prescribe to treat bacterial infections.
Pain relievers such as ibuprofen (Advil) or acetaminophen (Tylenol) can be bought without a prescription to alleviate pain and reduce fever.
Peppermint tea is often used as a natural medicine to soothe stomach discomfort or headaches.
The COVID-19 vaccine is an example of a medicine that prevents the spread and effects of a virus.
